name: Middle to Senior Business Analyst
description: Middle to Senior Business Analyst | Job Sky Solution Bỏ qua nội dung Post Views: 472 ● Working location: Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay District, Hanoi● Type: Full-time● Minimum Experience: 3 years● Salary: Competitive salary based on qualifications/skillsWe are seeking a Middle to Senior Business Analyst with at least 3 years of experience to join oursoftware development company. This role is pivotal in driving project success by analyzing businessprocesses, identifying improvements, and ensuring solutions meet strategic goals. Responsibilities:● Conduct comprehensive analysis of business needs across various departments including IT,marketing, sales, and operations.● Lead the development and review of complex business requirements documents, ensuring theyalign with business objectives and strategic goals.● Develop and propose business solutions that are innovative and feasible, evaluating risks andpotential impacts.● Oversee the implementation of approved solutions, working closely with project managers andtechnical teams to ensure timely delivery.● Manage stakeholder expectations through regular updates and review sessions, ensuring alignmentand satisfaction throughout the project lifecycle.● Analyze current practices and systems, recommending improvements and efficiencies usingdata-driven insights. Requirements● Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or related field.Master’s degree or MBA preferred.● Minimum of 3 years of experience, preferably in the software or technology industry.● Strong analytical skills, the ability to tackle problems systematically and provide practical solutions.● Proficient in Business Analysis tools (e.g., MS Visio, Balsamiq) and techniques.● Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, capable of working effectively ina dynamic team environment.● Demonstrated leadership in managing projects and mentoring team members.● Relevant certifications (e.g., CBAP, PMP) are highly desirable.● TOEICs / IELTs certificate How to ApplyInterested candidates should submit their resume to tuyendung@skycorporation.comWe look forward to your application! Open-day: 11/11/2024 Due date: 25/1/2025 Để lại một bình luận HủyEmail của bạn sẽ không được hiển thị công khai. name: Node JS / Golang Backend Developer
description: Node JS / Golang Backend Developer | Job Sky Solution Bỏ qua nội dung Post Views: 359 ● Working location: Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay District, Hanoi● Type: Full-time● Salary: Competitive salary based on qualifications/skills● Minimum experience: 2 years We are seeking a talented and experienced Node.js/Golang Backend Developer to join our development team. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and high-performance backend solutions using Node.js or Golang and related technologies for a fast growing global Ecommerce platform. The ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of backend development principles, strong proficiency in Node.js, and a passion for delivering top-quality code. Responsibilities:● Develop and maintain server-side applications using Node.js / Golang and relatedframeworks, including:○ Implement data storage solutions and integrate with databases and externalservices, such as MongoDB, PostgresQL, Firebase Firestore, etc.○ Implement interfaces with frontend (Restful API / Websocket, etc. ) and theprocessing logic for those interfaces.○ Deploy and maintain backend structure for stable and scalable service provision.● Collaborate with front-end developers, product managers, and other stakeholders todesign and implement efficient and scalable backend solutions.● Write clean, modular, and well-documented code that adheres to industry best practices.● Optimize backend logic processing performance to ensure fast and responsive userexperiences.● Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.● Debug and resolve application defects and performance issues.● Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in Node.js and backenddevelopment. Requirements● Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field fromHUST, PTIT, VNU, FPT, UTC, …● Proven experience as a Node.js Backend Developer or similar role.● Experience with database systems such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.● Strong knowledge of RESTful API design and development.● Experience with cloud computing services, such as Firebase (Auth/Store/…), Amazon(S3 / Lambda/ …).● Experience with source version control and CI/CD using Github or external services.● Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.● Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, agile development environment. Benefit● Monthly Salary: Competitive salary based on qualifications/skills● Collaborative and dynamic work environment where you will have the opportunityto work with a talented and passionate team.● As a startup, we value our employees and believe in investing in their professionaldevelopment. We offer opportunities for growth and advancement.● In addition, we offer stock options to eligible employees as a way to align their interestswith the company’s success and incentivize their contributions to our growth. To apply, please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant portfolio or code samplesdemonstrating your Node.js backend development skills.How to ApplyInterested candidates should submit their resume to:tuyendung@skycorporation.com or contact: 0389 444 285 Ms Diep – HRWe look forward to your application! Open-day: 11/11/2024 Due date: 25/1/2025 Để lại một bình luận HủyEmail của bạn sẽ không được hiển thị công khai. name: Software Tester
description: Software Tester | Job Sky Solution Bỏ qua nội dung Post Views: 364 ● Working Location: Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay District, Hanoi● Type: Full-time● Salary: Competitive salary based on qualifications/skills● Experience Level: Junior, Mid-level, and Lead Responsibilities:● Engage with product stakeholders (customers, product owners) to gather and translateinformation into technical requirements for product testing.● Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and prepare necessary test data.● Perform test cases, document results, and generate insightful reports.● Collaborate with various departments to resolve test issues and ensure product quality.● Write user guides and FAQ documentation for end users. Additional Responsibilities for Test Lead:● Lead and mentor the testing team, providing guidance and support to junior/mid-level testers.● Oversee the overall testing strategy, ensuring alignment with project goals & timelines.● Implement and maintain testing best practices, processes, and standards.● Conduct performance reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.● Identify and address any skill gaps within the testing team, recommending training ordevelopment opportunities. Requirements:● Degree from HUST, PTIT, VNU, FPT, UTC, or equivalent.● Strong understanding of product development processes and software testing stages.● Experience levels: At least 1 year of full-time experience as a tester.● Proficiency in testing tools such as JMeter, Selenium, TestComplete, etc.● Good English reading and writing skills (≥ 500 TOEICs).● Detail-oriented, responsible, and eager to learn new skills.● Software testing certification is a plus. Benefits:● Competitive monthly salary, based on experience.● Collaborative and dynamic work environment with a talented and passionate team.● Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.● Stock options for eligible employees to align their interests with the company’s success. If you are passionate about software testing and excited to join a fast-growing startup in the dropshipping industry, we encourage you to apply for this role. Application Process:Interested candidates are invited to submit your application to:Email:tuyendung@skycorporation.com.Contact: 0389.444.285 – Ms. Diep – HR Open-day: 11/11/2024 Due date: 25/1/2025 1 bình luận về “Software Tester” Job Sky Solution cho biết: We have already filled this position. name: Web/App UX/UI Designer
description: Web/App UX/UI Designer | Job Sky Solution Bỏ qua nội dung Post Views: 336 We are looking for a talented Web UX/UI Designer to join our startup team. As a Web UX/UIDesigner, you will be responsible for designing and implementing user interfaces for our platform. You will work closely with the development team to create visually appealing and user-friendly web pages, ensuring that our platform is easy to navigate, functional, and intuitive. We strongly encourage developers who are experienced in Page Builder projects to apply. ● Working location: Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay District, Hanoi● Type: Full-time● Salary: Competitive salary based on qualifications/skills● Minimum experience: 1.5 years Responsibilities:● Collaborate with the development team to conceptualize and design user interfaces.● Create wireframes, prototypes, and hi-fi mockups to effectively communicate design ideas.● Conduct user research and gather feedback to inform design decisions.● Optimize the user experience of the developed web/app.● Work with the dev team to ensure that designs are implemented accurately and efficiently.● Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in web UX/UI design Requirements:● Proven experience as a Web UX/UI Designer or similar role.● Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and relevant work experience.● Experience in Page Builder projects is a strong plus.● Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite.● Understanding of web design principles and best practices, including responsive design andaccessibility.● Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams in a fast-paced startup environment.● Excellent communication and time-management skills.● Bachelor’s degree in Design, Computer Science, or a related field (preferred). Benefit:● Competitive salary and benefits package.● Collaborative and dynamic work environment where you will have the opportunity to workwith a talented and passionate team.● As a startup, we value our employees and believe in investing in their professionaldevelopment. We offer opportunities for growth and advancement. If you are passionate about designing user-friendly and visually appealing web interfaces, and areexcited about the opportunity to join a fast-growing startup in the software industry, we encourage you to apply for this role. name: SEO CONTENT
description: SEO CONTENT | Job Sky Solution Bỏ qua nội dung Post Views: 348 Responsibilities: Collaborate with SEO staff to come up with article topics and write SEO content for Global websites (content written entirely in English). Write content for the website’s profile on social media platforms. Work with the SEO team to implement On-page and Off-page tasks as required. Participate in building and managing the website, contributing creative content ideas. Analyze and evaluate competitors’ articles to implement content strategies. Support content production for other online channels (as required). Perform other tasks as assigned. Requirements: Experience in writing SEO articles. Good English skills: IELTS minimum 6.5 or the ability to write content entirely in English. Understand basic On-page SEO elements. Creativity in content development. Knowledge of creating images/videos for articles is a plus. Ability to research keywords and outline articles is a plus. Strong self-learning ability, proactive, and highly responsible in work. Strong analytical, synthesis, planning, and reporting skills. Good time management, with the ability to work both independently and as part of a team. Benefits: Compensation: Competitive salary based on qualifications/skills Incentives: Additional incentives according to company policy. Healthcare: Insurance and annual health check programs. Annual Review: Salary review, Tet Bonus, and 13th-month salary. 12 vacation days/year and 2 holidays/year. Periodic team-building events and more Working Hours: Monday to Friday.
